_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five kinds of sensual stimulation th: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Sounds known by the ear that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Smells known by the nose that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Tastes known by the tongue that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
The stages of creating an opening amid c: Entering and remaining in the first absorption
Entering and remaining in the second absorption
Entering and remaining in the third absorption
Entering and remaining in the fourth absorption
Entering and remaining in the dimension of infinite space
Entering and remaining in the dimension of infinite consciousness
Entering and remaining in the dimension of nothingness
Entering and remaining in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
The confinement in each stage of creatin: Whatever placing of the mind and keeping it connected has not ceased
Whatever equanimous bliss has not ceased
Whatever perception of form has not ceased
Whatever perception of the dimension of infinite space has not ceased
Whatever perception of the dimension of infinite consciousness has not ceased
Whatever perception of the dimension of nothingness has not ceased
Whatever perception of neither perception nor non-perception has not ceased
